entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
